name: The Grand Heist (itch)
description:
━ You have committed a felony (or felonies, in plural!) And it is with regret that I tell you that you have traveled at the time! ━

 As a college student who ends up in the position of inheriting the debts your brother escaped paying after mysteriously disappearing without a trace, you’ll have to steal a series of valuable items, whose complexity is gradually escalating throughout time.

Your latest theft will be the biggest one you have committed until now, a jewelry from an exclusive collection on display in the museum for a high society event.

The sapphire heart you have to obtain in order to break free from the claws of the strikingly powerful and ambitious man who controls your every move. But does fate have other plans written for you? 

━ Valerie De La Roche ━

She is the only owner of the most successful speakeasy in town. A powerful and straightforward businesswoman with a cool and authoritative demeanor, she will try to push you away, however, it depends on whether it is something you will allow her to do.

Description: Valerie has her silky, light blonde hair cut neatly at chin height, ivory-colored skin with a faint rosy undertone that emphasizes her tiny moles, as well as her dark gray eyes. She has a slender build and stands at 1.77m tall. ━ Eva Valentino ━ 

She is one of the most popular dancers performing at the club. Talented and charismatic, she could literally have everyone at her feet, nevertheless she has only one main purpose in her life; not allowing others to approach her so easily. It only depends on you to gain her trust.

Description: Eva has naturally curly dark brown hair, the soft curls touching her shoulders, her skin is a tan olive tone that suits her golden hazel eyes and draws attention to the constellation of tawny freckles scattered across her cheeks. She has a soft and curvaceous body and stands at 1.58m tall. ━ James Bradford ━

He is a private investigator, however, this is a knowledge that you are completely unaware about. A mysterious and sarcastic man with a dark past who always keeps his unapproachable front regardless of his undeniable interest in you, he will not allow you to win him over willingly.

Description: James keeps his black curly hair short, some rebellious curls falling over his temple, his bushy eyebrows and occasionally over his dark brown eyes, a stubble frames his sharp jaw. A number of minor scars are visible on the golden brown skin of his fingers and a larger one on his neck disappearing under his collar. He has a powerful frame, broad shoulders and back and stands at 1.84m tall. ━  Daniel McCarthy ━

A famous actor and considered one of the most handsome men of the decade, he apparently likes the spotlight focused on him, but this is far from being entirely true when he prefers silence. A lonely, genuine man who can be surprisingly shy, he will make it difficult for you to approach him for fear of being used and abandoned. All that is dependent on is whether you can get past his barriers.

Description: Daniel has his auburn, wavy hair cut short that is often combed back, his skin is a rosy beige that highlights his blue-green eyes. When he smiles, his dimples that line both corners of his mouth become even more apparent. He has a lean, toned frame, and stands at 1.90 m tall.
